content.title: Rules
content.text:
General Rules

#1. Cheating: Do not cheat in any form. This includes the use of exploits, glitches, or third-party programs.

#2. Hate Speech: Zero Tolerance. Absolutely no hate speech or targeting of any kind towards any individual or group of people will be tolerated.

#3. Personal Matters: Do not bring personal, out-of-game matters into the public server channels.

#4. Admin Impersonation: Do not use "Admin," "Mod," or any variation in your tribe name or player name. (Violation could result in a structure wipe or a ban).

#5. Mass Breeding: No excessively large or disruptive mass breeding operations. Use common sense regarding server performance.

#6. False Accusations: Do not falsely accuse players or tribes without proper evidence. All accusations must be backed by proof (screenshots, video, tribelog, etc.).


Base & Building Rules

#1. Obelisk Building: Do not build at or directly block any Obelisk.

#2. Base Limits: Tribes are permitted a maximum of 3 total active bases:
2 Land Bases
1 Water Base

#3. Structure Spam: Keep structure spam to a reasonable minimum. Spam is permitted around your own bases and active FOBs, but do not spread it excessively across the map. (No more than 6 FOB's)

#4. Anti-Mesh: Zero Tolerance. Do not build meshed structures or use any form of mesh exploit. (Violation will result in an immediate tribe wipe and potentially a ban).

#5. Unbreakable Structures: Do not use structures that cannot be destroyed to block off entrances or points of interest.


Raiding & PVP Rules

#1. Wild Dinos: Do not use wild dinos to try raid or destroy a base.

#2. Shop Zone PVP: No PVP at the dedicated Shop location. (Violation could result in an immediate ban).
If you are killed at the shop, you must provide clear proof (video evidence is highly recommended) to the Admins.

#3. Admin Protection: Do not raid while under active Admin protection.

#4. Descended Dinos: Do not use Wardens or Seals (From Descended) while raiding.

content.title: Server Info
content.text:
The stats of this server are:
x25 Harvest
Boosted Dino/Player stats
Quick Tame
Boosted Breeding
Casino (found at green obelisk)
Points Shop (Hold X/E/Square) or Click F1
Awesome Teleporters
Automated Dino Wipes
Imbue & Upgrade Bench
Custom Caves
Custom Content
And much more

Some useful info:



What belongs to each mod?


Demon = High Ark Bench

Beta, Alpha, Electric, Volcanic, Hydro,
Fairy, Mythic, Shadow, Demonic, Angelic, Origin and
Nightmare = Primal Smithy

Silver, Gold, Diamond, Emerald, Amethyst, Ruby,
Gemstone, Void, Almighty, Supreme = Superior bench, Void Bench, Almighty Bench, Supreme Bench



How do I get Supreme/Almighty/Void Tier?

Almighty is the 2nd best and rarest tier in the server with higher health, damage and protection than all other tiers besides supreme

There are 5 way's of obtaining Almighty & Void items
- Discord shop/In-game points shop
You can either earn points within the server to get enough points to purchase the small almighty bundle which gives you all the main structures needed to build a base or you can use our discord shop system to earn enough coins to purchase the almighty bundle

- In-game progression (by killing boss)
 To unlock Void you need to craft the Void boss spawned within the Superior bench
                                                    ↓
 To unlock Almighty you need to craft the Almighty boss spawned within the Void bench
                                                    ↓
 To unlock Supreme you need to craft the Supreme bench within the Almighty bench
 Then you need to farm Gamma coins by either successfully detonating a nuke or destroying a nuke
 And then you can craft a supreme spin for 2 Gamma coins
 
- Giveaways
We aim to do 1 giveaway weekly allowing 3 players to win almighty tier items / structures each week

- Events
We aim to do events throughout the season involving almighty tier items / structures

- VIP Casino (This is for almighty only)
VIP casino has a shop with all the almighty structures and tools available 
https://high-ark.com/donation-packages/



How do I get coins for casino?


  Bronze Coins
Step 1: Get a High Sickle (this can be claimed in points shop
or crafted at highark bench)

Step 2: Harvest fiber to get bud seeds to grow
Step 3: Build a farm with greenhouses, water, crop plots and place
your bud inside

Step 4: Sell your weed

  Silver Coins
Step 1: Kill Mythic or Legendary creatures to get
blood/hide

Step 2: Sell at shop

  Boss Coins
Step 1: Kill primal, demonic, mythic creatures to craft progression gem

Step 2: Sell at casino



What is High Ark Starter Protection?


High Ark Starter Protection is a Tek Forcefield with a huge
radius and is very tough to protect you for up to 24 hours when you first
join, This can be reclaimed if you get wiped as
The “Raid Relief” Package



How do I get Gold, Diamond, Emerald etc?


Tools and structures can be crafted in superior bench

You will need either:

Silver pickaxe to get --> Gold

Gold pickaxe to get --> Gold, Diamond

Diamond pickaxe to get  --> Gold, Diamond and Emerald

Emerald pickaxe to get  --> Gold, Diamond and Emerald, Amethyst

Amethyst pickaxe to get  --> Gold, Diamond and Emerald, Amethyst, ruby

Ruby pickaxe to get  --> Gold, Diamond and Emerald, Amethyst, ruby

You will need to find "Rich Metal Deposits, which not all metal nodes are rich so some may just give you stone)



More info such as tutorials/guides can be found on the discord in the how-to-play section

content.title: FPS Boosters
content.text:
Lily's Tweaker

This can be accessed by either:
Double tap Y/Triangle
Or
Click F5
Or
Holding E/X/Square and selecting the option within radical wheel

When using Lily's Tweaker you can use a set of commands that will autorun each time you join a server with Lily's Tweaker installed

Some of the most popular commands are:

Ultra (5% - 15% FPS Gain)

r.Lumen.Reflections.Allow 0 | r.Shadow.CSM.MaxCascades 0 | r.VolumetricCloud 0

High (15% - 25% FPS Gain)

r.DynamicGlobalIlluminationMethod 0 | r.Shadow.CSM.MaxCascades 0 | r.VolumetricCloud 0

Medium (35% - 45% FPS Gain)

r.DynamicGlobalIlluminationMethod 2 | r.Nanite.MaxPixelsPerEdge 4 | r.Shadow.CSM.MaxCascades 0 | r.VolumetricCloud 0

Low (45% - 55% FPS Gain)

r.ContactShadows 0 | r.DynamicGlobalIlluminationMethod 2 | r.Nanite.MaxPixelsPerEdge 4 | r.Shadow.CSM.MaxCascades 0 | r.VolumetricCloud 0 | r.volumetricfog 0 | r.Water.SingleLayer.Reflection 0

Potato (95% - 105% FPS Gain)

grass.enable 0 | r.ContactShadows 0 | r.DynamicGlobalIlluminationMethod 2 | r.Nanite.MaxPixelsPerEdge 4 | r.Shadow.CSM.MaxCascades 0 | r.ShadowQuality 0 | r.VolumetricCloud 0 | r.volumetricfog 0 | r.Water.SingleLayer.Reflection 0
